remarks: Approximate version of ~ itg2le .  If ` F <_ G ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S.2 F <_ S.2 G ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itg2lea.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
itg2lea.2 $e |- ( ph -> G : RR --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
itg2lea.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
itg2lea.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` A ) = 0 ) $.
itg2lea.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( RR \ A ) ) -> ( F ` x ) <_ ( G ` x ) ) $.
itg2lea $p |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` F ) <_ ( S.2 ` G ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d ph x $.
